1.title: Aldrig mere diva - del 1
1.plot: Alberte has started sharing personal details on her YouTube channel. Her friends are worried about her sharing so many details. When Alberte talk about a stalker following her, everyone is eager to help her.

2.title: Aldrig mere diva - del 2
2.plot: Albertes story about her stalker has made her YouTube channel grow, and she is getting new sponsors. What will happen when the class figure out that the story is made up?

3.title: Verdens pinligste mor
3.plot: Laurits and Ida has started dating and she's supposed to come to his house after school. Laurits is afraid that his mom will be an embarrassment, and her FaceTime call in class doesn't make it better.

4.title: Den hemmelige fest
4.plot: Nanna, Luna and Ellie is planning something but won't tell Alberte what it is. Ronja tries to help, but her help back-fires.

5.title: Divaernes nye dronning
5.plot: It's time for the class' first German lesson. All the girls think that German is stupid, so Luna fear that she won't be able to replace Alberte as queen of the class, if they learn that she actually speaks German.

6.title: Flirt i luften
6.plot: Everyone is still avoiding Alberte because of her fake story about Pelle. When the class has to do a group assignment, Magnus is forced to work with her. But is she as bad as everyone makes her.

7.title: Tåber i trafikken
7.plot: Kasper has joined the school crossing guards with the aim to go on the trip to Tivoli. When a little girl is about to be hit by a car, Laurits tries to kill the story with a bribe.

8.title: Ida smadrer streak
8.plot: Ida and Nomi are about to reach their 200th streak on Snapchat, when Nomi has to go on a family trip without her phone and they agree that Ida should take care of Nomi's streaks while she is gone.

9.title: Besat af mærkevarer
9.plot: Alfred is obsessed with wearing the right brands. When he comes to school wearing a new cap, and none of his friends notice, he decides to find some new friends to hang out with.

10.title: Luna likehunter
10.plot: Alberte is still being excluded by the other kids after her fake story about Pelle. When Luna challenge her to a Instagram like competition, she accepts, hoping that it will make her popular again.

11.title: Filmet i skjul
11.plot: Alfred has filmed Storm singing in the shower after gym. Storm beg Alfred to delete the video, but soon the entire class has seen it. Alberte offers to help Storm.

12.title: Hate på Harry Potter
12.plot: When the Danish YouTuber Anders Hemmingsen posts a look-a-like competition, Kasper, Hugo and Magnus starts discussing what to dress up as. When Hugo and Kasper is not serious enough, Magnus decides to skip their ideas.

13.title: Snydt af ven
13.plot: Noah is having trouble with math and gets help from Thea, in return Noah promise to choose her when they play football. When Noah doesn't keep his promise, Thea will no longer help him.

14.title: Besat af bryster
14.plot: The class is taught about the female body and Kasper and Laurits are eager to learn everything about breasts. Their eagerness to test a bra with various fruits, and their comments about the size, end up hurting Viola.

15.title: Tryllestav eller tissemand
15.plot: Pelle is really into magic tricks and has made his own magic wand. When Alfred and Noah starts poking fun about him and his magic wand, he doesn't get why. When Ida explains why, he almost give up on his new show.

16.title: Pigehemmeligheder
16.plot: It's time for the class' sex ed, and the girls have their own private lesson, in which they receive a bag. The boys are very interested in getting to know what's in the bag. When the girls won't tell them, they make a plan.

17.title: Den frække tidskapsel
17.plot: When the class is assigned the task to create a time capsule, Kasper is keen on making the perfect one, since his older brother, has told him stories of all the cool things they put in theirs.

18.title: Ondt i brysterne
18.plot: The kids are playing football when Ida is hit in the chest. Hugo is concerned as it appears that it hurt real bad. When Ida doesn't want to talk about it, he gets more concerned and he starts searching for possible causes on the Internet.

19.title: Lyver Luna? Del 1
19.plot: Luna has arranged a movie night and invited the boys. Nanna and Ellie is a bit concerned because Luna tend to be a drama queen, especially with boys around.

20.title: Lyver Luna? Del 2
20.plot: With all of Luna's lies, Nanna and Ellie struggle to believe that her cat is really dead. They decide to give her one last chance.

21.title: Den værste sidekammerat
21.plot: The class are having new seats, and Ida is very eager to sit next to Laurits. Laurits is concerned that Ida will be a disturbance, so he tells the teacher that Ida is copying his work, to get her moved to the front of the class.

1.title: Sukkerchok
1.plot: Liam and Karl are bored during free period. They find a wheelchair and decide to take it for a spin.

2.title: Det Første Kys
2.plot: Amalie, the new girl, has asked Liam to help her with her math assignment. Liam has never visited a girl before. Do they have to kiss? Liam ask Emil to teach him how to kiss.

3.title: Aktivist
3.plot: Sara has joined an activist group, and want everyone to join their cause to save the mink. Tilde is eager to help gather signatures, but Sara is not pleased with her practice.

4.title: Drengevenner
4.plot: Is Karl crazy for Tilde? Emma is quite certain that is the case.

5.title: Gruppebilledet
5.plot: A new hashtag is trending on Instagram. Will Emma get the most likes for her picture? Only the coolest kids can be in it.

6.title: Den Nye Dreng
6.plot: Most of the girls are excited. The rich kid Cornelius has his first day at the school. Sara is forced to show him around, and Tilde wants to help.

7.title: Efteraber
7.plot: Astrid is wearing the same shirt to school as Emma, the most popular girl. Emma wants revenge, so tells the others to start parroting Astrid in class.

8.title: Dovne Emil
8.plot: Sara and Emil have to do an assignment together, however Emil is not focusing on the task at hand. He is busy on his phone and Sara is determined not to do his part of the work.

9.title: Skole-hjem-samtale
9.plot: There's Teacher - Parents meeting at school, and Liam is quite anxious. He's not always behaving well, and he's afraid how his mother will react. Liam tries to find a way to avoid attending the meeting

10.title: Dårlig Taber
10.plot: It's sports day at school. Emma and Emil is supposed to team up, but Emma gets an injury, so she has to sit on the bench with Tilde, while Emil teams up with Alexander and Sofia.

11.title: Karl Under Pres
11.plot: Karl is hiding at school, he has a secret he does not want to reveal, and seeks assistance from Ida.

12.title: Kæreste-tyv del 1
12.plot: Sofia tells Emma that she likes Emma's boyfriend. This has huge consequences for Sofia.

13.title: Kæreste-tyv del 2
13.plot: After all that have been said and done, will Emma and Sofie be able to make amends?

14.title: Samis nye gamle sang
14.plot: Sami is working on an intro for his YouTube channel, and needs someone to sing. Finding a singer is not as easy as he had thought.

15.title: Listen
15.plot: After her breakup with Emil, Emma is searching for a new boyfriend. In order to ensure he is perfect, she create a list of questions, to test possible boyfriends

16.title: Ældre kærester
16.plot: Sara has found a boyfriend from an older grade. She thinks that the boys in her own grade are too childish.

17.title: Hacking
17.plot: Tilde by mistake sends an embarrassing picture of Karl to the entire class. Sami is giving her a hand correcting the mistake.

18.title: Klassekassen
18.plot: The class is going on excursion, Liam can't afford it. Emil rebels to help his friend.

19.title: Det nye par
19.plot: Sofia is in love with a boy from the class. Tilde does her best to try to help her.

20.title: Bagedysten
20.plot: The class is having a baking competition, but Sofia and Emma has some issues they need sorted out before they can start baking.

21.title: Kapitalister
21.plot: Sara gives her new iPad to Liam, but later regrets. Liam does not understand, and will not give it back, so they both end up in the principals office.

22.title: Please, Cornelius
22.plot: Cornelius has a cream, that Emma would really like to get. Cornelius decides to use that to his advantage.

23.title: Sjove typer
23.plot: Sally thinks that Sofia and Emil are too boring, so she challenges them to make the whole class laugh before the end of the day.

24.title: Scorekongen Liam
24.plot: Liam wants to prove to Sami that he can hook up with Emma, so they make a bet. Turns out not to be as easy as he thought.

25.title: Cornelius som sponsor
25.plot: Sami is working on an app, which can tell if your clothes are "Dope" or "Nope". He needs money to finish development, and want Cornelius to be the sponsor.

26.title: Netkæresten
26.plot: Sami is nominated as the up-and-coming YouTuber of the year. Cornelius is jealous and tries to pull a prank on Sami.

27.title: Karl får energidrik
27.plot: Karl has been playing computer games all night, so he drinks some of Sami's energy drink. Turns out energy drink is not good for him.

28.title: Nye bukser
28.plot: A girl in class pee in her pants. Liam tries to help her by creating a distraction and find some new pants.

29.title: Piger til salg
29.plot: Cornelius believes all girls are for sale, and want to prove it by offering girls money for a photo. Sara doesn't like his plan, so she interferes.

30.title: Hidsigprop
30.plot: Karl can't be quiet in class, which causes the biology teacher to threaten him with expulsion. Emil and Tilde thinks that their teacher has overreacted and tries to help Karl.

31.title: Biebers Lonely Girl
31.plot: Tilde has two tickets for the Justin Bieber concert. She wants to invite a friend, but selecting the right one is not as easy as she thought.

32.title: En aftale er en aftale
32.plot: Sofia is tired of Emil breaking all their appointments. Emma tells her that it may be because he has found someone else.

33.title: MGP Sangen
33.plot: Tilde and Sally wants to participate in MGP and need help creating a video. They ask Sami for help.

34.title: Ven eller sladrehank
34.plot: Someone has trashed a guitar. Will anyone snitch?

35.title: Cornelius' hemmelighed
35.plot: Cornelius is making fun of Sonja after here secret crush is revealed to the entire class. Sami wants to help Sonja and tries to dig up some embarrassing details on Cornelius.

36.title: Helte-salon
36.plot: A group of the boys are role-playing. The girls think it is rather childish, it's more mature to play hair salon.

37.title: Anoreksi
37.plot: Sofia is convinced that a girl in the class has anorexia. Some of the other girls persuade her to confront the girl.

38.title: Kærester i en måned
38.plot: Emil and Sofia has been a couple for a month, and Sofia has planned to celebrate it. Emil has forgotten all about it, and arranged a football night with his friends. What will he choose?

39.title: Mobil-tyven: Del 1
39.plot: Emma gets mad at Hannah and steals her cellphone. She starts going through the content and post some of Hannah's private pictures on Instagram.

40.title: Mobil-tyven: Del 2
40.plot: The entire class are turning their backs on Emma after she posted the picture of Hannah. Will Emma be able to make it all good again?

41.title: Motionsdag er skod
41.plot: It's the yearly exercise day and the pupils have to choose between running 3, 5 or 10 km. Sami doesn't want to run, so he tries to find a way to avoid it.

42.title: Hvem ved hvad?
42.plot: The door to the school toilet is locked, and has been for a long time. Who is in there?

43.title: Tissemanden
43.plot: Karl is accused of having drawn a big penis on the wall, and he gets a disgusting punishment.

44.title: Emmas dilemma
44.plot: Emma is forced to do a group assignment with Sami, since Astrid won't let her be in group with Cille.

45.title: Sara pjækker
45.plot: Sara skips classes to get her ears pierced.

46.title: Den sidste dronning
46.plot: Astrid is bossing everyone around when the class is making a wedding card for one of their teachers. Liam wants Emma back in charge.

47.title: Fodbold i nederdel
47.plot: Sally has a crush on Alexander, but he just sees her as one of the boys on the football team. She tries to wear as skirt and high heels to get his attention.

48.title: Onde veninder
48.plot: Some of the girls led by Chili pulls a prank on their art teacher. It gets more serious than they expected, and Astrid decides to leave the group

49.title: Mælkeduks
49.plot: Sofia and Sara are supposed to fetch the milk for the class, but the milk is to old. They are ordered by the gym teacher to give it to the class anyway.

50.title: Hannahs far
50.plot: Hannahs dad has died. The class decides to make a video for her, but Karl won't participate.

51.title: Den første menstruation
51.plot: Sara has her first menstruation, and Astrid by mistake tells the boys, who starts making fun of Sara.

52.title: Astrids frygt
52.plot: Astrid has to do a presentation in front of the class. She has a crush on one of the boys, and fear that she will make a fool of her self.

53.title: Løgnen
53.plot: Cornelius tells the class that he is celebrating his birthday on his fathers big yacht, but some of the boys doesn't believe him.

54.title: Fosfor-chok
54.plot: Karl is bored in class, so together with Sami he steals some phosphor. They want to make a YouTube video.

55.title: Superfan
55.plot: Sara can't stand danish music, so when she is offered to participate in a music video, she passes the offer on to Tilde.

56.title: En fremmed
56.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

57.title: Top 3
57.plot: Emma has a crush on several of the boys, so decides to make a top 3 in order to select the right one, but she finds out that it is not as easy as it may sound.

58.title: Brandalarm
58.plot: Liam is in trouble. He is not doing well in class, and if he fails the test, his mom will not allow him to play football in the weekend. He is begging Karl to help him avoid the test.

59.title: Slap af Alexander
59.plot: Karl makes a remark about Astrid and her banana which makes Alexander believe that Karl is a racist. But is that really what bothers Alexander?

60.title: Alt for pinligt
60.plot: A new lady has started working in the school canteen. Liam doesn't want the other children to find out that it is his mother.

61.title: Forbudt billede
61.plot: Fie takes a photo of Sara while she is changing for gymnastics. Sara wants her to delete the picture, but Fie denies its existence.

62.title: Vold
62.plot: A new kid is joining the class after he has been expelled from his old school. Tilde tries to make him feel welcome, but it turns out not to be so easy.

63.title: Noia i kælderen
63.plot: Strange sounds comes from the basement below the school. Karl, Sami and Max decides to go down there to investigate.

64.title: Vinderholdet
64.plot: The substitute teacher in gym class forces Emma to be on team with all the sports enthusiasts, which at first, doesn't suit her. Turns out it may not be so bad anyway.

65.title: Kærester eller ej: Del 1
65.plot: Sofia sees Emil flirt with Emma. Emil tells her that it's nothing, but can Sofia trust him? She meets an older boy who seems to understand her issues.

66.title: Kærester eller ej: Del 2
66.plot: It's the day after Sofia and Emil's break-up. Sofia is doubt of her feelings, the older boy Noah, seems to understand her. Will Emil let her go without a fight?

67.title: Skolefesten
67.plot: The class are preparing a big party. Someone has made a huge mess in the science classroom, and the headmaster is sure he it's someone from the class. The party is put on hold until the mess has been cleaned up.

1.title: Kys med bøjle
1.plot: Liam has managed to convince Tilde, that she can't kiss someone who is also wearing braces, and challenges her to test it on Alexander.

2.title: Stjerne på YouTube
2.plot: Bertram is annoyed that he is not getting noticed by the others, so he wants to become a Youtuber. Sami and Chili do their best to help him out, but not all goes as expected.

3.title: Upopulær
3.plot: Tobias is the new boy at the school. He's already become friends with Max, but Max is not as popular as Tobias thought.

4.title: Signes dagbog
4.plot: Signe has a tough time in class. Her best friend Fie wants to help her, but doesn't know how. That changes when Fie finds Signes diary.

5.title: Sofias fødselsdag
5.plot: It's Sofia's birthday and the girls decides to celebrate the day on a cafe. Sofia and Emma end up in a strange mans car.

6.title: Pisse pinligt
6.plot: The class is going on camp. Cornelius would really like to have his own room, since it's not always going well when he stays overnight.

7.title: Rødvin
7.plot: Naja and Sara are bored at camp, so they decide to steal the teachers wine.

8.title: Forsvundet
8.plot: The class is orienteering. Emil wants to be in control and one of the teams gets lost in the woods.

9.title: Sandhed eller konsekvens: Del 1
9.plot: Tilde has a crush on Liam, but she is not the only one.

10.title: Sandhed eller konsekvens: Del 2
10.plot: The class returns after their trip. Will Liam end up with Emma? Astrid helps him.

11.title: Skal du se X Factor?
11.plot: It's the night of the X-factor semi finale and Naja is having a party, but who's invited?

12.title: De seje piger
12.plot: Fie and Signe are best friends. Fie is tired of being looked at as childish, so she tries to find new more grownup friends.

13.title: Klassens klogeste
13.plot: It's time for a test in the class. The test doesn't go as well as Aminah had hoped and Emma is surprised by her own result.

14.title: Det sorte squad
14.plot: There's a new squad in the class, and Signe consider to join it.

15.title: Seksualundervisning
15.plot: The class is having sex ed, and Sofia and Emil arrives late for class. Emil think they should try to start a little rumor, but this soon goes out of hand, and they need to find a way to stop it.

16.title: Skal de skilles?: Del 1
16.plot: Fridas parents argue a lot, and she doesn't know why. Sofia, Astrid and Cille tries to help her.

17.title: Skal de skilles?: Del 2
17.plot: Astrid, Sofia and Hannah do their best to help Frida cope with the news that her parents are getting separated.

18.title: Skolens smukkeste pige
18.plot: Tobias has signed up for the school musical. The others think musicals are stupid, so he tries to keep it a secret.

19.title: Dobbeltdaten
19.plot: Emil and Sofia and going on a double date with Emma and Liam. The day does not turn out as expected.

20.title: Venner eller kærester?
20.plot: With everyone else busy dating, Tilde is tired of being single, so maybe it's time for her to find a boyfriend?

21.title: Grov joke
21.plot: Bertram is keen on becoming a stand-up comedian on YouTube. In his efforts he hurts Frida.

22.title: Tro på det!
22.plot: The class gets a visit by a priest. Sofia is in doubt about her beliefs, and Emil makes a bet that she can't decide.

23.title: Kongen af FIFA: Del 1
23.plot: Cornelius beats everyone when they play FIFA. Betram and Karl has a plan for how to change that.

24.title: Kongen af FIFA: Del 2
24.plot: Bertram and Karl initiate their plan. Will they manage to beat Cornelius in FIFA?

25.title: Café-flirten
25.plot: Sara have seen a cute boy on a cafe in the mall, and asks Aminah to help her talk to him.

26.title: Pigernes omklædning
26.plot: The class have swimming lessons. Liam and Karl decides to try to sneak into the girls changing room.

27.title: Farvel Liam
27.plot: Liam has been kicked out of the school. Karl believes it is not to late to change the schools decision.

28.title: Kylling i fare!
28.plot: The kids have found a small chicken in the classroom, and tries to hide it from the teachers.

29.title: Tobias og Victoria: Del 1
29.plot: Victoria has a crush on Tobias. Tobias is in doubt of her true intentions. Why would the prettiest girl want to be with him?

30.title: Tobias og Victoria: Del 2
30.plot: After having overheard Frida and Aminah's talk with Victoria, Signe have decided to help Tobias, but will Victoria change her mind?

31.title: Hvad kan Liam blive?
31.plot: The students have to find an internship, but Liam has forgotten all about it. If he doesn't find one before the weekend, he is stuck with following their teacher.

32.title: Han drukner!
32.plot: Max participates in the diving competition even though he is not a very good swimmer.

33.title: Red verden
33.plot: The class is collecting money for a charity. Can Sif make the difficult choice, and pick just one?

34.title: Løbe hjemmefra: Del 1
34.plot: Chili is dealing with some issues at home. Sara wants to help her, but finds out, Chili's issues are more serious than she thought.

35.title: Løbe hjemmefra: Del 2
35.plot: Sara lets Chili stay at her place, and tries her best to help Chili dealing with her problems.

36.title: Bukserne af!
36.plot: Bertram is working hard on getting more views on his YouTube channel. He asks Tobias to help him with a prank, but Tobias think it's too childish.

37.title: Signes nye veninde
37.plot: Signe is not allowed to be part of the squad, so she and Aminah are forced to work together.

38.title: Er Sami syg?
38.plot: While trying to get revenge on Sami, by filming him embarrassing himself, Cornelius, Tobias and Albert discover that Sami have some very special rituals.

39.title: Kan piger score?
39.plot: Frida would like to play football with the boys. They won't let her, because girls can't score goals, so she makes a plan with the rest of the girls.

40.title: Er vi kærester?: Del 1
40.plot: Sara and Cornelius tries to help save Emil and Sofia's relationship, and suddenly there's a new couple in the class.

41.title: Er vi kærester?: Del 2
41.plot: After getting advice and talking with Sara and Cornelius, Sofia and Emil breaks up, but will Sara and Cornelius follow their own advise?

42.title: Dumt
42.plot: Karl gets blamed for what Max has done. Will Max do the right thing, and be a good friend?

43.title: BFF?
43.plot: Tilde and Karl are both in love with each other. They just don't know it, and they don't dare to tell the other how they really feel.

44.title: Skolefoto
44.plot: It is time for the annual school photo. Some of the children are sick, others have simply forgotten.

45.title: Det store klasseshow
45.plot: Bertram and Signe are going live on YouTube in front of the whole school. Turns out not to be as easy as they thought.

1.title: Det hemmelige instrument
1.plot: Josephine has started playing violin, but feel a bit embarrassed about it. To impress Frederik, she comes to accepts playing at the morning assembly.

2.title: Smykketyven
2.plot: Frida becomes jealous when Martine has bought the necklace that she has posted a picture of on Instagram.

3.title: Frederiks mors bryster
3.plot: Mads has by accident taken a picture of Frederiks moms breasts, and the picture is sent to everyone in the class.

4.title: Cool eller klovn?
4.plot: Caroline and Sif becomes the laughing stock, when they arrive dressed up as dangerous fur monsters at the annual 'Hallo-lavn'-party.

5.title: Hjerter på pigetoilettet
5.plot: Bertram is cheating his way to become Caroline's boyfriend, and Tobias is not completely pleased with his approach.

6.title: Kærestesorger
6.plot: Tobias is missing Victoria, but Bertram is there to help him forget her.

7.title: Likehunter
7.plot: Mathilde is obsessed with getting likes, and Freja feels that she is spending too much time on her phone and too little on her friends.

8.title: Kongen af Klassen
8.plot: Bertram has cheated his way to become 'King of the class'. Will he succeed in keeping the secret?

9.title: Den nye dronning - del 1
9.plot: Frida wants Martines help to get the boys attention, but Martines help comes with a cost.

10.title: Den nye dronning - del 2
10.plot: Frida decides that Martine should become part of The Black Squad, something she's gonna regret.

11.title: Spytklatten
11.plot: Aida has a crush on Christoffer and Christoffer has a crush on Aida. Caroline tries to help the two find each other.

12.title: Dreng mod pige
12.plot: Max comes up with the idea that Christoffer and Caroline should do a run against each other. The biggest challenge turns out to be to decide who won.

13.title: Din far er en nar
13.plot: Frederik persuades Mads to join him on the football team. Mads quickly starts arguing with the coach, who unfortunately is also Frederiks dad.

14.title: Torsken i tasken
14.plot: Martine finds a codfish in her bag, and accuses Frida for putting it there. But who really did it?

15.title: Vild med den samme
15.plot: Frederik and Mads both have a crush on the same girl. Does she have feelings for either of them?

16.title: Martines private billede - del 1
16.plot: Frida is jealous because Frederik shows more interest in Martine than in her, so she makes a cunning plan.

17.title: Martines private billede - del 2
17.plot: Fridas plan turn out to have some serious consequences for herself.

18.title: En pinlig hemmelighed
18.plot: Mads persuades Caroline to enter the basement with him to find inspiration for the school newspaper. While down there they make a surprising discovery.

19.title: Makeup or Not
19.plot: Caroline wants to appear more grownup so Aida helps her put on makeup. Martine is not completely satisfied with this new Caroline.

20.title: Mikkel har ingen venner
20.plot: Mikkel haven't got that many friends. He tries to become friends with Mads and Frederik by inviting them to his house.

21.title: Martines store hemmelighed - del 1
21.plot: Tobias discover a secret about Martine, which cause some big consequences.

22.title: Martines store hemmelighed - del 2
22.plot: Tobias wants to become friends with Martine, but ends up making a fool of himself.

23.title: Pinlig mor
23.plot: Josefine has forgotten her phone at home, and is now afraid that her embarrassing mom will bring it to her at school.

24.title: Ny og vild tøjstil
24.plot: Mathilde wants to color her hair pink, because she wants to be pastel goth. The class is not entirely ready for the new Mathilde.

25.title: Bertrams nye gamle kæreste
25.plot: Bertram and Britt have to do an assignment together. They may have more in common than they think.

26.title: Hvem stinker? - del 1
26.plot: Josefine has started smelling of sweat, but by accident accuses one of the other girls to be the source of the smell.

27.title: Hvem stinker? - del 2
27.plot: Britt reveals a secret from hers and Josefines past which makes Josefine regret what she has done.

28.title: Kampen om magten
28.plot: Aida runs for the student council but is challenged by Christoffer who has suddenly become very interested in politics.

29.title: Squad or not
29.plot: Martine is going away on holiday and is afraid that her friends won't miss her so she takes some drastic methods in use.

30.title: Telefon-stalkeren
30.plot: Mathilde is tormented by a scary voice that calls her on her birthday. Who is behind the scary voice?

31.title: Alt for meget drama - del 1
31.plot: Josefine feels that there is not enough hours in a day. Mathilde worries that Josefine has stress.

32.title: Alt for meget drama - del 2
32.plot: Josefine realize that she has a problem, and make a drastic decision which involves Frederik.

33.title: Alt for meget drama - del 3
33.plot: Josefine finally think that all her problems have been solved, but yet again she is let down by her mom.

34.title: Messi eller Ronaldo? - del 1
34.plot: Mads and Frederik has a championship match coming up, but Martine and a pair of borrowed football boots cause some trouble.

35.title: Messi eller Ronaldo? - del 2
35.plot: Mads refuses to return Frederiks football boots, and their friendship is put to the test.

36.title: Messi eller Ronaldo? - del 3
36.plot: Mads has been humiliated by Frederik and refuses to show up for the match. Without Mads on the team, it will be tough to win.

1.title: Venner eller fjender - del 1
1.plot: Mads and Frederik participates in the yearly Foosball tournament. Their friendship is not what it used to, making it difficult to be team players. Mads will do everything to win while Frederik is more interested in talking with Josefine.

2.title: Venner eller fjender - del 2
2.plot: Mads and Frederik are close to get kicked out of the tournament. Their friendship is put to the test when they are challenged in the game. Will they manage to find their old chemistry? Or will they have to accept that they've grown apart?

3.title: Tobias stjæler
3.plot: The class party is on and Tobias was assigned to get candy and chips, but has forgotten all about it. The boys pressures him to get it in a way which may not be strictly legal. A call from the police scares him - will he end in jail?

4.title: En dum idé
4.plot: Josefine has started on a diet and finds it hard. Mathilde believes that it can't be that hard, and joins her. Mathilde does the diet with no trouble at all, but maybe there's a good explanation.

5.title: Mads spiller smart
5.plot: After his break with Frederik, Mads has found a new best friend - a puppy. He's constantly bragging about it, hurting especially Signe, who just lost her dog. She gets other things on her mind, when she notice something strange about Mads.

6.title: Lille lort
6.plot: Bertram is sick and tired of being mad fun of because of his height. Tobias is keen on helping Bertram. He is sure that there is benefits to being short, but his thesis is put to the test when there's a riot in the schoolyard.

7.title: Kæreste ping pong - del 1
7.plot: Tobias still have feelings for Martine, but find it difficult to tell her. He eyes a chance when the price at the table tennis tournament is a trip to the cinema with Martine. But how do you join the tournament when you don't have a bat?

8.title: Kæreste ping pong - del 2
8.plot: Martine has found out that Tobias has a crush on her, but she's not interested in him. Signe on the other hand, has a crush on Tobias, and she tries to tell him, but it's difficult when he doesn't listen.

9.title: Aida imod Squad'et
9.plot: The class has been told to read a book, but that's not what the Black Squad do. Aida, who loves reading, think that they are being silly, and tries to convince them of how cool reading. The Black Squad responds by bullying Aida.

10.title: Drengekærester
10.plot: Tobias and Bertram have been working on a YouTube video where Tobias kiss Bertram. Bertram is convinced that Tobias has feelings for him, so he does his best to avoid him. Tobias think that Bertram is angry with him, but doesn't know why.

11.title: Den falske profil
11.plot: Mads is worried when someone pretends to be him on Instagram. The class set out to figure out who is behind the fake profile. Martine has a good notion who it might be.

12.title: Den perfekte prank
12.plot: Signe and Caroline are sick of all of Bertrams pranks in class, so they decide to pull the ultimate prank on him, with help of Tobias. But will they succeed in pranking the ultimate prankster?

13.title: Signe får hjemve - del 1
13.plot: The class is preparing for the school play, and stays overnight at the school. Signe is in charge of the big dance act. She is afraid to sleep at school and is too embarrassed to tell the others, so she tries to come up with a valid excuse.

14.title: Signe får hjemve - del 2
14.plot: Signe overcomes her fear of sleeping at the school, and rehearse the dance routine without problems. When night falls - her homesickness returns, and Mads constantly trying to scare the girls doesn't make it better.

15.title: Alle hader dig
15.plot: The class is playing a new game on their phone. Bertram is a fast learner and beats everyone. He loves to brag about his skills, causing lots of frustrations. Someone gets enough and Bertram starts receiving mean texts.

16.title: Nye kærester
16.plot: Martine and Mads decides to become a couple, believing that being the most popular in the class, they will make the perfect couple. Esther does not agree, since she has a crush on Mads, so she does all she can to split the new couple.

17.title: Tæsk i skolegården
17.plot: Tobias witness some of the older boys beating up a smaller kid. With no teachers in sight, Tobias decides to intervene on his own. This turns the older boys against him, and now he can't walk safely in the schoolyard.

18.title: Sviner på Insta
18.plot: Sif is bored when she's not allowed to go to the brace dentist with Josephine and Mathilde. She spend the time on Instagram, where she makes a comment on one of Josefines photos. A comment which is not well received by everyone.

19.title: Hold dig væk!
19.plot: Bertram is busy on his YouTube channel. He has forgotten about his friends, so suddenly feel all alone. He's not allowed to join the Barca club, because he's not into football. However Tobias is allowed in the club, why?

20.title: Dårlig hårdag
20.plot: Sif is teased with her red hair. The big boys finds it funny to call her Pippi and strawberry top. To put an end on this, she decides to color her hair. Mathilde tries to convince her that it is a bad idea, but will she be able to stop her?

21.title: Den hemmelige blog
21.plot: The class is participating in a writing competition. The best essay will be published and Aida is keen on winning. She seeks inspiration on Google, but when handing in her essay, someone else has written the same story.

22.title: Hvem skriver Tobias med? - del 1
22.plot: Tobias has met a new friend online who promises him to become part of a pro-gamer team in WoW. He needs to be both skilled and brave - and to prove he is brave, Jeppe asks that Tobias send a photo without his shirt on.

23.title: Hvem skriver Tobias med? - del 2
23.plot: Jeppe keep asking Tobias for a nude photo, and threatens with sharing the photo Tobias has already sent. Tobias is scared and doesn't know what to do. The other boys sense something is wrong, when Tobias starts getting short-tempered.

24.title: Mere selvtillid
24.plot: Tobias admires Signes courage to be herself, so when they have to pick new class partners he wants to pick her, hoping he can learn from her. What will the boys think? And Bertram - they always pick each other.

25.title: Martines bryllup - del 1
25.plot: The Black Squad forces Martine to have a real school wedding. In the beginning she finds it funny, but when they force her to marry Tobias who they believe is the ugliest boy in class, Martine gets in doubt.

26.title: Martines bryllup - del 2
26.plot: The Black Squad threatens to kick Martine out if she doesn't marry Tobias. Tobias sense that something is wrong, and don't want to marry her, so Martine gets desperate, and will do everything to stay in the squad.

27.title: Mobbet på YouTube
27.plot: Bertram and Signe are looking for new guests on their talk-show. Sif and the twins offers their help, to discuss the topic of the day - bullying. Soon the talk takes a turn and turn into live bullying.

28.title: En plads i rekordbogen
28.plot: It's activity day, and the class is challenged with breaking records from the Childrens Recordbook. Aida and Josefine decides to aim for the ultimate record, but when you are not able to work as a team it's not easy.

29.title: Er du adopteret?
29.plot: There's a rumor floating that Clara is adopted. When Clara finds out that Martine is behind the rumor, she threatens to reveal her secret. Soon a battle of rumors and gossip is going on - they soon find out it's not the way to go.

30.title: Slikker på toiletbræt
30.plot: Caroline is bored and join the jackass club made by Tobias, Bertram and Mikkel. They challenge each other to lick different items. To begin with it's all fun. Then Caroline has to either lick something disgusting or become ridiculed.

31.title: Smidt ud af gruppen
31.plot: Mikkel, Bertram and Tobias have a gaming club after school. Mikkel enjoys the club, since it's a way to stay in touch after he transfers school. One day he notice that Tobias and Bertram have created a new Snapchat without him. Why?

32.title: Ny pige i squad'et - del 1
32.plot: Esther has got menstruation and seek help from the older girls. It makes here twin sister Agnes feel left out and she seeks comfort with the Black Squad. The squad has sinister plans, and want's to teach Esther a lesson.

33.title: Ny pige i squad'et - del 2
33.plot: Esther is mad at Agnes after the quarrels with the Black Squad. The older girls come to the rescue. The have a plan to teach the Black Squad a lesson, which will hopefully save the twins relationship.

34.title: Bertrams musikvideo
34.plot: Bertram has been thrown out of class. He decides to spend the time making a music video with Sif. They film some older boys making graffiti and suddenly Betram is on the run. The older boys wants to catch him before he publish the video.

35.title: Forelsket på chatten
35.plot: Tobias has a small crush on a girl that is writing a blog he's reading, but he doesn't know who she is. Bertram fears that it's an old man who is behind the blog, so Tobias set out to solve the mystery. It could be the girl of his dreams.

36.title: Er han vild med mig?
36.plot: Josefine has a crush on Frederik but does he have feelings for her? She asks Mathilde for help, but Mathilde is more keen on hooking Josefine up with one of the older boys. Josefine is confused - should she go for Frederik or the older boy?

37.title: Dronning af Klassen
37.plot: Election is up for becoming queen of the class. It's a tie between Caroline and Signe. The class have the rest of the day to decide who should win. Caroline sense that something is not right with the election, she launch a counter attack.

38.title: Kendt fra TV
38.plot: A news team visits the school and Bertram eyes the chance to become famous on TV. He manages to become part of the segment, but his persistence backfires when he by mistake expose his friends.

39.title: Frederik og Josefine - del 1
39.plot: Martine tries to bring Frederik and Josefine together once and for all. They are both skeptic, so she initiate a drastic plan which involves locking Josefine and Frederik in at the school.

40.title: Frederik og Josefine - del 2
40.plot: Josefine and Frederik are still locked in at school, after Martines plan to bring them together went a bit wrong. Are they still friends after spending a night alone at school?

1.title: Hvad skjuler Magnus? - del 1
1.plot: It's Magnus first day at a new school. He is very keen on making a good first impression and figure out who is the popular kids. Christian gives him an introduction to everyone. When Ida interferes, Christians sense Magnus has a secret.

2.title: Hvad skjuler Magnus? - del 2
2.plot:

5.title: Belastende BFF
5.plot: After joining the handball team Lea and Gry has become close friends. Lea wants to spend all her time with Gry, however Gry also wants to spend time with her other friends.

6.title: Hvem er tyven?

11.title: En desperat joke
11.plot:

12.title: Pelles klamme kaninfod
12.plot:
Know what this is about?

13.title: Christians første kys
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Stikker!
14.plot: Ida and Magnus' relation as step siblings comes to the test when Alma bumps into Ida and drops her phone. Will Magnus tell the truth or stick with Alma's story?

15.title: Try not to cry
15.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

16.title: Forelsket på fire minutter
16.plot: Christian feels sad. He doesn't know how to tell Smilla how he feels. He seeks comfort with Stine, who has read an article on how to catch your crush. Christian is not quite convinced, so they test the 4 minute rule on each other.

17.title: Langt fra en diva
17.plot: Nomi envy the popular girls squad, so she decides to make her own with Ronja. When the boys find the pictures they've taken funny, Nomi hopes that she can be part of their "loser squad", but is a squad more important than best friends?

18.title: En alvorlig nyhed
18.plot: When the class is told that Lea's parents are getting divorced. Viola tell the class to avoid all topics related to parents and family. Hugo arrives late so haven't heard the plan. Is avoidance really what Lea want?

19.title: Ikke længere pap-søskende - del 1
19.plot: Magnus has been in a bad mood lately. Ida thinks it's because of their parents divorce, which she has promised not to tell the class. When he snaps at his best friend, she decides to tell the class, but is it the divorce that makes him sad?

20.title: Ikke længere pap-søskende - del 2
20.plot: It's Magnus last day, and Ida has planned a surprise for him. Magnus is conflicted, he doesn't want to hurt his mother and doesn't want to leave his classmates, but how can he tell his parents that?

21.title: Stjæler fra lærerværelset
21.plot: Alberte has gotten 2000 followers on Instagram and wants to make a live-stream to thank them. When the teacher confiscate her phone because she disturbs the class, she tricks her friends to steal the phone from the teacher.

22.title: Ingen invitation
22.plot: Ellie plan a party. She is allowed to invite 10 people, matching the number of girls in class. When she invites two of the boys, leaving Nomi out, Lea is torn. Should she go to the party and hook up with Alfred or go dancing with Nomi?

23.title: Mysteriet om det knuste kranie
23.plot: A skull has been damaged, so the teachers starts an interrogation of the suspects last seen in the class room.

24.title: Alt for Alma
24.plot: Storm has a crush on Alma from 8th grade, so when she asks him for a favor, he cancels his CS GO gaming night with Otto. Otto has his suspicions as to Alma's real intentions.

25.title: Fobi for snot
25.plot: Kasper is anxious for the upcoming test in chemistry. When the teacher place him in a group with Inge he has to overcome his phobia for mucus.

26.title: Dum for dig
26.plot: Ronja has a crush on Magnus. In order to be able to spend time with Magnus she has made a plan for how to get in a group with him.

27.title: En tarvelig challenge
27.plot: Pelle has challenged Ida to sing whenever she talks, so when she's called up to the blackboard to solve an equation she has to think fast, in order not to become the laughing stock.

28.title: Aldrig forelsket
28.plot: The class get the assignment to compose lyrics for a song. Pelle get the theme love, but how do you write about love when you've never been in love with anyone?

29.title: Christians crush - del 1
29.plot: Christian has a small crush on Nanna. Just when he has worked up the courage to ask her out, she asks him to set her up with Konrad from one of the older classes. Christian is not sure it's a good idea but helps Nanna any way.

30.title: Christians crush - del 2
30.plot: After receiving the text from Konrad, Nanna is the 7th heaven. When he invites her to the skate park, she immediately accepts, there's just one challenge - she doesn't know how to skate. Christian reluctantly agrees to help her.

31.title: Min værste, bedste ven
31.plot: Laurits lost a bet to Kasper so he has to be Kasper's servant for the week. When Nisha has to be the class' head girl alone, Kasper offers his assistance to get her attention, however his plan backfires.

32.title: Rich kid?
32.plot: When Ronja overhears Alfred saying that Magnus are into rich girls, she asks Mika and Viola for help. Is Magnus really into rich girls and will it help Ronja become closer to him that she appears to be rich?

33.title: Krise i klassen - del 1
33.plot: There's a lot of noise and disturbance in the classroom, and nobody is really getting along. Viola has a plan - she wants to have a birthday party in class, and asks Ronja for help.

34.title: Krise i klassen - del 2
34.plot: Ronja doesn't understand what she has done that has made Viola so mad. Kasper gives her a hint as to what it could be and she tries to make up for her mistake.

35.title: Et vådt uheld
35.plot: Pelle and Viola are working on a project and Ida feel left out. In order to get Pelle's attention, Ida invokes their challenge game, forcing Pelle to pretend he has an invisible friend.

36.title: Albertes wannabes
36.plot: Alberte has to choose between French and German, and decides to ask her friends for advice, however her friends just wants the same as her.

37.title: Den hemmelige SMS
37.plot: Vicky has been in a really bad mood lately and the class wonder why. Viola by chance see a text on Vicky's phone, and together with Storm tries to solve the issue Vicky has with her boyfriend.

38.title: Det forsvundne kærestebrev - del 1
38.plot: Ida has a crush on Laurits. She doesn't know how to tell him. The option to tell him via text is gone when their phones are collected. She tries to tell him in person, which doesn't go well. Her final option is the love letter.

39.title: Det forsvundne kærestebrev - del 2
39.plot: Ida don't want to take any chances when being black mailed, so she brings the one kilo candy the blackmailer has asked for. Laurits attempt to help Ida backfires, and she receives a new demand.

40.title: Det forsvundne kærestebrev - del 3
40.plot: Laurits and Ida spot that Alberte, Kasper and Viola still have their phones. They send a message to the Instagram profile in hope that they can reveal who is behind, but none of the 3 pick up their phones.

41.title: Det forsvundne kærestebrev - del 4
41.plot: With the thief's demand for more candy Ida is about to give up. Laurits get the idea to use the drone to keep an eye on the candy. When the drone crash Ida gets expelled from school making her regret writing the letter.

42.title: Det forsvundne kærestebrev - del 5
42.plot: Time is about to run out when Laurits gets the idea to use the footage from the drone demonstration to reveal who has stolen the letter.

43.title: Spark mig!
43.plot: Viola has worked hard with learning to program their micro bit. Kasper is impressed with her work and convince her to hand over the code. When Kasper misuse her code to make fun of people, she gets really mad.

44.title: Forelsket eller fodbold
44.plot: Sigurd has a small crush on Mika and usually they bike to school together, but lately it seems to Sigurd that Mika is trying to avoid him. He's afraid of what will happen if he tells her how he feels.

45.title: Hvordan kysser man?
45.plot: Ida would really like to be part of a girls night. When she hear the popular girls discuss kissing, she lies and tell them that she knows how to kiss. When her best friends can't help her with information she search the Internet.

46.title: Magnus mobber
46.plot: Ida is annoyed that Magnus and Christian keep pulling pranks on their substitute teachers, so she and Pelle decides to ask their new substitute for help pulling a prank on them.

47.title: Fortnite fail
47.plot: Alfred is in charge of getting t-shirts for the Fortnite team. When his dad deliver the shirts, he realize he has made a mistake and only ordered size small. How will he tell Ask that the shirt is to small for him?

48.title: Pigernes omklædningsrum
48.plot: When Kasper and Laurits play with Laurits new robot during gym class they are sent to the changing rooms. Kasper improve the mBot by adding his phone as a camera, which cause trouble when the mBot ends up in the girls changing room.

49.title: Den perfekte profil - del 1
49.plot: Storm has a crush on Alberte. In order to get to know her better he creates a fake profile on Instagram and starts writing sweet comments on her pictures. His plan backfires when Alberte gets interested in the fake person.

50.title: Den perfekte profil - del 2
50.plot: Kasper does his best to help Storm come up with an excuse for the failed date with Alberte and she agrees to give the date another chance.

51.title: En kikset dobbeltdate
51.plot: Laurits and Ida want to spend more time together but their friends keep bugging them. Laurits gets the idea to try to make Kasper and Pelle to become friends, so that they all four can be together.

52.title: Hvem er modigst?
52.plot: Mika, Christian and Magnus are bored during recess. Christian and Magnus have heard a rumor about a secret button located in the basement. Mika claims she is brave enough to push the button to see what happens.

53.title: Kopi-piger
53.plot: It's time for the class photo and Viola has found the perfect hairstyle for the day. Alberte shows up with the same hairstyle and everyone believes that it's Viola that has copied Alberte's idea.

54.title: Den falske autograf
54.plot: Magnus tries to sell his signed Manchester shirt to Otto. Ronja spots that the autograph is fake and confronts Magnus. He admits that his story is made up. He can only come to the movies by selling it, so Ronja promise to keep the secret.

55.title: Mord i kælderen
55.plot: When Alfred tease Pelle about being afraid of the dark, Pelle accepts Alfreds challenge to go to the basement and see who can stay the longest. Pelle pleads Ida to help him beat Alfred.

56.title: En nat på skolen
56.plot: The class have a sleepover at the school. Magnus, Alfred and Alberte have a plan to try to break each of the 3 rules set by the teachers.

57.title: Bange for at fejle
57.plot: Inge is afraid that her classmates will laugh at her if she can't answer the teachers questions, so she is hesitant to raise her hand. When she sees how little Hugo cares about the class laughing at him, she decides to ask him for help.

58.title: Fortnite squadet
58.plot: The Fortnite squad is in need of a fourth player. They decide that whoever reach level 70 first will get the spot. When Noah can't keep up with Alfred's progress, he decides to cheat.

59.title: Laurits er synsk
59.plot: Laurits thinks he's become psychic because things he thinks begins to happen. He tries to talk to his best friend Kasper, but he just makes fun of him.

60.title: Verdens værste fødselsdag
60.plot: It's Albertes birthday and everything is perfect. Then Ellie post an ugly photo of her on Instagram.

61.title: Mor på dating - del 1
61.plot: Laurits mom has used his phone so when Kasper wan't to show Laurits something, her dating profile pops up on the screen. Kasper promise not to tell anyone, a promise he keeps until Laurits tell their classmates about baby pictures of him.

62.title: Mor på dating - del 2
62.plot: Laurits is mad at Kasper after he showed the class her moms dating profile. The class keeps making fun of it which wasn't Kasper's intention, so he tries his best to make up for what he have done. Meanwhile Nisha tries to comfort Laurits.

63.title: Alberte er en drama queen
63.plot: Alberte and Magnus have a big quarrel in the schoolyard, and everyone wonders what it is about. Alberte accuse Magnus of lying to her. He doesn't understand what the fuss is all about.

64.title: Flirt ude af kontrol
64.plot: When Laurits mom and teacher starts flirting he find a way to benefit from it. All is going well until his teacher becomes an embarrassment in front of the classmates.

65.title: Våben med i skole
65.plot: In the library Viola and Nanna hear an older boy talking about weapons. They find that he's been searching for weapons on the net and decide to alert their teacher. When he doesn't listen, they take the matter into their own hands.

66.title: Tudefjæs
66.plot: The class is playing indoor football when Mika in the heat of the game call Luna a whiner, causing Luna to get mad and wanting revenge.

67.title: Måske kærester?
67.plot: Ida and Laurits has become very close, but haven't put words on it yet, so when Kasper asks them if they are a couple, they give different answers.

imdb.title: Klassen
plot: What is happening in the class? Who are friends, who are enemies - and who has had a mishap? The pupils have yet another day ahead of them.::Floydian <contact@floyd.dk>
